titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries - Description

div.p: The United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries is an ORGANISATION.

The United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries (UKIACR) brings together ORGANISATIONS with an interest in developing cancer registration as a resource for studying and controlling cancer in England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.
For further information on the United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries, see the United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries website at: About us.
